Iâ€™ve been missing work, getting into arguments with my partner, and I know itâ€™s getting out of handâ€”but I donâ€™t know how to stop. I tried cutting back and couldnâ€™t.
column4: Based on the clinical context and self-report, the patient appears to be experiencing signs of alcohol use disorder. The elevated AUDIT (Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test) score suggests heavy alcohol consumption that is causing functional impairment in various areas of life, such as work and relationships. Despite attempts to reduce drinking, the patient has been unable to do so, indicating potential dependence. Further assessment and appropriate intervention are recommended.
